title: GMES for Africa: Regional Network for Information Exchange and Training in Emergencies
abstractText: 'To enable and enhance the ability of African states to use satellite Earth Observation for the management of natural and man-made humanitarian emergencies. To develop a network of EU, African organisations and African users, in order to build economic, technical and commercial capacity within African states, along the priority lines being identified in consultation with the African Union under the �GMES and Africa� initiative.'
